description: Enable natural language access to Brazilian treasury bond data through MCP-compatible clients. Query market data, bond details, and search/filter bonds using everyday language. Benefit from smart caching to reduce API calls while ensuring data freshness.

useMcpCache.description: Enable in-memory cache for API responses

capabilities.name: market_data
capabilities.description: Retrieves general market data from Tesouro Direto, including opening/closing times and status

capabilities.name: bond_data
capabilities.description: Retrieves detailed data for a specific bond from Tesouro Direto

capabilities.name: search_bonds
capabilities.description: Search for bonds by type (ANY,SELIC, IPCA, PREFIXADO) or maturity date range
